name: MOUNTAIN GOATFACE
description:
"CLIMB HIGH, MOUNTAIN GOATFACE!"

Welcome to Mountain Goatface, a brand new game with classic arcade feel! A quick and simple mashup of the fun platforming from Donkey Kong mixed with the enemy dodging and item finding of Pac-Man. Climb all fiveFOUR mountains and unlock new techniques to help dodge the insidious Snow Monaters and defeat Doctor Christmas to collect your flags and win the sweepstakes! Enter today!

PRESS F4 TO TOGGLE FULLSCREEN.
